text: Caris is a given name and a surname. Notable people with the name include: ==Given name== *Caris LeVert (born 1994), American basketball player *Caris Tiivel, Australian model and beauty pageant ===Fictional characters with the given name=== *Caris Woolet, one of the main characters in the Ken Follett novel World Without End ==Surname== *George Caris (1927–2013), Australian rules footballer *Gerard Caris (born 1925), Dutch sculptor and artist *Magnus Caris (born 1968), Swedish darts player ==See also== *Cari (name) Category:Masculine given names Category:Feminine given names
title: Caris (name)
